info.name: Stackoverflow code focus (Stackexchange)
info.description:
Focus on the question and answers. Remove everything else.
99.99% of the time that's all I need. For the other .01%, switch off the theme as needed.
info.additionalInfo:
Currently v0.1.
- All comments are currently hidden. I'm thinking about only hiding comments on the question or adding additional styling to comments.

Repo: https://github.com/mrgnw/sofocus/
